```{r setup}
library(authenticate)
```

A front end for any shiny app that requires access to internal databases to run the app. A user must have valid credentials to access the server: `sole`. These credentials are used to both access the app and run it.

## Usage

To launch the app:

    runAuthenticate()

Then enter your credentials in the fields shown and login

```{r eval=T,echo=F }
knitr::include_graphics(paste0(getwd(),"/figures/appScreenCap1.PNG"))
```
